extensionDescription.message: This extension allows you to pin your favorite websites to the New Tab page. The New Tab page allows for customization, has night mode with the ability to turn it on automatically based on the time of day, as well as a set of lively animations. It also allows you to add any website to the New Tab via context menu! The extension doesn't send your info anywhere and stores all the links and preferences in your local storage - be sure to make backup codes regularly so that you won't lose anything.

BtnEditinnerText.description: Button that makes extension go into edit mode.

BtnKillinnerText.description: Button that makes extension go into delete mode.

CompactModeDescriptiontitle.message: Panels will not be visible until you hover the mouse cursor over the place where they used to be

FontFamilyDescriptioninnerText.message: To change the list of fonts used on this page
FontFamilyDescriptioninnerText.description: Tells the user what's a font-family and how to use it.

FontFamilyDescriptionBoldinnerText.message: provide a CSS font-family string, then press Enter or click out of the field
FontFamilyDescriptionBoldinnerText.description: Tells the user what's a font-family and how to use it - info in bold tag.

BackupDescriptionPart1innerText.message: To generate a code that contains info about your favorites and current settings press
BackupDescriptionPart1innerText.description: Tells the user how to create backup.

BackupDescriptionPart2innerText.message: Then, to restore your data, you can paste a properly formatted code into the field below and press
BackupDescriptionPart2innerText.description: Tells the user how to restore backup.

TextareaBackuptitle.message: Paste restoration code here or copy generated code from here
TextareaBackuptitle.description: Hint for user on backup textarea.

BtnReadBackupinnerText.description: Load backup code into the extension.

ExtensionDescriptioninnerText.message: This extension allows you to pin your favorite websites to the New Tab page. The New Tab page allows for customization, has night mode with the ability to turn it on automatically based time of day, as well as a set of lively animations.

BackupRestorationError.description: Failure to restore backup due to improperly formatted JSON.
